text: Yui Kamiji was the defending champion, but lost to Diede de Groot in the final. Diede de Groot won her first title, defeating Yui Kamiji in the final, 6–2, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Bracket=== == External links == * Draw Wheelchair Women's Singles U.S. Open, 2018 Women's Singles
title: 2018 US Open – Wheelchair Women's Singles
